alert.note: Alert for Southern Lake County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 29 at 2:07AM PDT until October 29 at 1:00PM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PDT THIS MORNING... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, northeast winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph at upper elevations. For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 36 in protected valleys will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Southern Lake County. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 1 PM PDT this afternoon. For the Frost Advisory, until 9 AM PDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Frost Advisories and Freeze Warnings are issued during the local growing season as defined by climatology and local agriculture experts. Once the growing season has ended these statements will no longer be issued until the spring.
